New design for my personal site

Jan 9, 2017

I spent time today continuing to refine the purpose and vision for my personal site.

Highlighting my frontend work is a priority, so I've made it easy to access my work from a fixed sidebar on the right.

I'm also going to make the images interactive. When a visitor hovers over one of the design it will showcase a unique engagement like hover to play or chopping a video.

It is definitely a thought provoking process breaking down what's important and I'm excited to see it take shape.
